projects.title: 'Burkin Story' Shopify Integration
projects.description: Modules and integrations to process, Enroll into, and scale with a Mobile App. Reach 1200+ brands in 10 seconds and accelerate sales with advanced marketing automation.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with advanced inventory management, payment processing, and real-time analytics dashboard. Supports multi-vendor marketplace functionality.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive project management tool with drag-and-drop interface, team collaboration features, and automated workflows. Integrates with Slack and Microsoft Teams.

projects.title: Custom Shopify Theme
projects.description: Responsive and performant Shopify theme with advanced customization options, mobile-first design, and optimized checkout flow. Increased conversion rates by 35%.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time data visualization dashboard with interactive charts, custom reports, and exportable analytics for business intelligence. Handles 1M+ data points efficiently.

projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
projects.description: Online food ordering platform with menu management, order tracking, and payment integration. Features real-time kitchen display and delivery tracking.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: Progressive web app for fitness tracking with workout plans, progress tracking, and social features. Integrates with wearable devices via APIs.

projects.title: Real Estate Portal
projects.description: Property listing platform with advanced search filters, virtual tours, and integrated CRM. Features map-based search and mortgage calculator.

projects.title: Subscription Box Store
projects.description: Shopify store for subscription-based products with recurring billing, customizable boxes, and customer portal for managing subscriptions.

projects.title: Learning Management System
projects.description: Educational platform with course management, video streaming, quizzes, and progress tracking. Supports multiple instructors and student cohorts.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: Warehouse and inventory tracking system with barcode scanning, stock alerts, and supplier management. Reduces inventory errors by 60%.

projects.title: Event Booking Platform
projects.description: Event management and ticketing platform with seat selection, QR code tickets, and organizer dashboard. Handles high-traffic events smoothly.

projects.title: Portfolio CMS
projects.description: Custom content management system for creative professionals with portfolio showcase, blog, and client testimonials. SEO optimized and lightning-fast.

projects.title: Healthcare Appointment System
projects.description: Medical appointment scheduling system with patient records, doctor availability, and automated reminders. HIPAA compliant with secure data handling.
